response.raw:
Here is the memo referring unresolved customer grievances:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
To: Customer Relations, Technical Support, Billing Departments
From: [Your Name], Senior Customer Service Representative
Date: [Current Date]
Subject: Referral of Unresolved Customer Grievances for Further Investigation

Please be advised that the following customer grievances have not been satisfactorily resolved by our customer service team and require additional investigation by the designated departments:

[Grievance 1]
Customer Name: John Smith
Account Number: 555123
Issue: Recurring technical issues with product X leading to loss of functionality
Recommended Action: Technical Support team to diagnose root cause of issues and determine fix or replacement

[Grievance 2]
Customer Name: Sarah Johnson 
Account Number: 555456
Issue: Disputing charges for services customer claims they did not authorize
Recommended Action: Billing team to review account charges and discuss with customer to resolve disputed amounts

[Grievance 3]  
Customer Name: Michael Lee
Account Number: 555789 
Issue: Seeking refund for product that did not meet advertised specifications
Recommended Action: Customer Relations to evaluate product marketing claims and determine if refund is warranted

Please investigate these grievances promptly and respond back to the customer and myself with proposed resolutions. Let me know if you need any additional information from the customers to assist your inquiries.

Thank you,
[Your Name]
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
